translations: 齿轮，轮齿；（木工）凸榫；小人物；中世纪海船
给……装配齿轮；以雄榫连接；抄袭；掷骰子时作弊，诈骗

sentences.sentence: In general, our society is becoming one of the giant enterprises directed by a bureaucratic manage we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao  in which man becomes a small well-oiled cog in the machinery.
sentences.translation: 总的来说，我们的社会变成了一个官僚化管理的大型企业，其中的所有人都成了这台机器中润滑良好的小齿轮。

sentences.sentence: Mr. Lake was an important cog in the republican campaign machine.
sentences.translation: 雷克先生是共和党竞选机器中一个小人物，但却发挥了重要作用。
